channel.title: Abit of help
channel.description: hey i have figured out that i needa save and then exit npchandler when i have changed it. but i also figured out that you have to compile could someone please help me with that...

item.title: Abit of help
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Wow have you figured out that? awesome.

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin
ant compile
pause

C:\apache-ant-1.7.0[font=Verdana][size=12pt]<------- Is the version if you have a later version you can just change the numbers or something[/size][/font]

If you don’t have ant then search its to easy for me 2 explain. hope it helps

Read full topic
